TITLE: Episode 108 - White As Snow with Cindy Harless
DESCRIPTION: This week, we talk to Cindy Harless of Abortion Recovery Alabama. We will be talking about her mission and ministry to help women who have had abortions and feel deep regret. We will talk about how abortion affects those who have gone through it and how she helps women become forgiven and set free. Also, her son is super handsome.
